TEXT.TEXTVALUE: Point the mouse to each component to know its name/Click the "Continue" button to start the experiment.
Now insert the sensor into the pot with plant.
Sensor completely inserted inside the pot.

Connect the Analog out (Red wire) to any one of the available eight analog pins labelled as A0-A7 because the connected dielectric moisture sensor is an analog sensor. If you would like to connect any digital sensor then, connect it to any one of the eight digital pins labelled as D0-D7.
Excitation wire (white) to be connected to the Vcc channel. Connect the Ground wire to any one of the two available ground channel (the pins labelled as GND).
Keep it on the data acquisition board.
Water falls into the pot with sensor.
Water seep into the mud around the moisture sensitizer.
The data will flow from the sensor to the mote through the data-acquisition-board.
The moisture values will be received in the hyper terminal. Plot the graph based on the received moisture values. Then analyze the graph plotted according to the variations in moisture.
